title: Valentina Zangirolami
text:
I am a PhD student in Statistics at Department of Economics, Management and Statistics of University of Milano-Bicocca. I currently live in Italy.
Research interests: Reinforcement Learning, Computational statistics
E-mail: valentina.zangirolami@gmail.com

title: Valentina Zangirolami
text:
Education









Visiting Research, London School of Economics and Political Science, London, United Kingdom.
Period Feb 2025–May 2025.
I am working under the supervision of Prof. Chengchun Shi












Ph.D. in Statistics, University of Milano-Bicocca, Milan, Italy.
Period Oct 2022–Ongoing.
I am working under the supervision of Prof. Matteo Borrotti












M.Sc. in Economics and Statistical Science, University of Milano-Bicocca, Milan, Italy.
Period Oct 2019–Jan 2022. Final mark: 110/110 with laude.
Thesis title: Recurrent structures of Deep Reinforcement Learning for self-driving car.
Advisor: Prof. Matteo Borrotti. Co-Advisor: Prof. Antonio Candelieri












B.Sc. in Economics and Statistical Science, University of Milano-Bicocca, Milan, Italy.
Period Oct 2016–July 2019.
Thesis title: The mobile telecommunication market: the entry of Iliad.
Advisor: Dott. Christian Garavaglia.
